Package us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface Pose3DReadOnly

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFramePose3DBasics, FramePose3DBasics, FramePose3DReadOnly, Pose3DBasics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FramePose3D, Pose3D
    public interface Pose3DReadOnly
    Read-only interface for pose 3D.

    A pose 3D represents a position and orientation in 3 dimensions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean containsNaN()
      Tests if this pose contains a Double.NaN.
      default boolean epsilonEquals​(Pose3DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Tests on a per-component basis if this pose is equal to other with the tolerance epsilon.
      default boolean equals​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
      Tests on a per component basis, if this pose 3D is exactly equal to other.
      default boolean geometricallyEquals​(Pose3DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Compares this to other to determine if the two poses are geometrically similar.
      default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.QuaternionBasedTransform transformToPack)
      Packs this pose 3D into the given transformToPack.
      default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform transformToPack)
      Packs this pose 3D into the given transformToPack.
      default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Tuple3DBasics positionToPack, us.ihmc.euclid.orientation.interfaces.Orientation3DBasics orientationToPack)
      Gets the position and orientation parts of this pose 3D.
      us.ihmc.euclid.tuple4D.interfaces.QuaternionReadOnly getOrientation()
      Gets the read-only reference to the orientation part of this pose 3D.
      default double getOrientationDistance​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
      Computes the absolute angle difference between this pose 3D and other.
      default double getOrientationDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple4D.interfaces.QuaternionReadOnly orientation)
      Computes the smallest angle representing the difference between the orientation part of this pose 3D and the give orientation.
      default void getOrientationYawPitchRoll​(double[] yawPitchRollToPack)
      Computes and packs the orientation described by the orientation part of this pose 3D as the yaw-pitch-roll angles.
      default double getPitch()
      Computes and returns the pitch angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.
      us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly getPosition()
      Gets the read-only reference of the position part of this pose 3D.
      default double getPositionDistance​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
      Computes the distances between the position part of the two poses.
      default double getPositionDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly point)
      Computes the distance between the position of this pose 3D and the given point.
      default double getRoll()
      Computes and returns the roll angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.
      default void getRotationVector​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Vector3DBasics rotationVectorToPack)
      Computes and packs the orientation described by the orientation part of this pose as a rotation vector.
      default double getX()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.
      default double getY()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.
      default double getYaw()
      Computes and returns the yaw angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.
      default double getZ()
      Gets the z-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.

    • Method Detail

      • getPosition

        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly getPosition()
        Gets the read-only reference of the position part of this pose 3D.
        Returns:
        the read-only position part of this pose 3D.

      • getOrientation

        us.ihmc.euclid.tuple4D.interfaces.QuaternionReadOnly getOrientation()
        Gets the read-only reference to the orientation part of this pose 3D.
        Returns:
        the read-only orientation part of this pose 3D.

      • getX

        default double getX()
        Gets the x-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.
        Returns:
        the x-coordinate of this pose 3D.

      • getY

        default double getY()
        Gets the y-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.
        Returns:
        the y-coordinate of this pose 3D.

      • getZ

        default double getZ()
        Gets the z-coordinate of the position part of this pose 3D.
        Returns:
        the z-coordinate of this pose 3D.

      • getYaw

        default double getYaw()
        Computes and returns the yaw angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the yaw angle around the z-axis.

      • getPitch

        default double getPitch()
        Computes and returns the pitch angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the pitch angle around the y-axis.

      • getRoll

        default double getRoll()
        Computes and returns the roll angle from the yaw-pitch-roll representation of the orientation part of this pose 3D.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Returns:
        the roll angle around the x-axis.

      • containsNaN

        default boolean containsNaN()
        Tests if this pose contains a Double.NaN.
        Returns:
        true if this pose contains a Double.NaN, false otherwise.

      • getOrientationYawPitchRoll

        default void getOrientationYawPitchRoll​(double[] yawPitchRollToPack)
        Computes and packs the orientation described by the orientation part of this pose 3D as the yaw-pitch-roll angles.

        WARNING: the Euler angles or yaw-pitch-roll representation is sensitive to gimbal lock and is sometimes undefined.

        Parameters:
        yawPitchRollToPack - the array in which the yaw-pitch-roll angles are stored. Modified.

      • getRotationVector

        default void getRotationVector​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Vector3DBasics rotationVectorToPack)
        Computes and packs the orientation described by the orientation part of this pose as a rotation vector.

        WARNING: a rotation vector is different from a yaw-pitch-roll or Euler angles representation. A rotation vector is equivalent to the axis of an axis-angle that is multiplied by the angle of the same axis-angle.

        Parameters:
        rotationVectorToPack - the vector in which the rotation vector is stored. Modified.

      • getPositionDistance

        default double getPositionDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Point3DReadOnly point)
        Computes the distance between the position of this pose 3D and the given point.
        Parameters:
        point - the other point used to measure the distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the distance between this pose and the given point.

      • getPositionDistance

        default double getPositionDistance​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
        Computes the distances between the position part of the two poses.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose used to measure the distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the distance between the position part of the two poses.

      • getOrientationDistance

        default double getOrientationDistance​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple4D.interfaces.QuaternionReadOnly orientation)
        Computes the smallest angle representing the difference between the orientation part of this pose 3D and the give orientation.
        Parameters:
        orientation - the orientation used to compute the orientation distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the angle difference between this and orientation, it is contained in [0, 2pi].

      • getOrientationDistance

        default double getOrientationDistance​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
        Computes the absolute angle difference between this pose 3D and other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose 3D used to compute the orientation distance. Not modified.
        Returns:
        the angle difference between this.orientation and other.orientation, it is contained in [0, 2pi].

      • get

        default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Tuple3DBasics positionToPack,
                 us.ihmc.euclid.orientation.interfaces.Orientation3DBasics orientationToPack)
        Gets the position and orientation parts of this pose 3D.
        Parameters:
        positionToPack - tuple in which the position is stored. Modified.
        orientationToPack - orientation in which the orientation is stored. Modified.

      • get

        default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.RigidBodyTransform transformToPack)
        Packs this pose 3D into the given transformToPack.
        Parameters:
        transformToPack - the rigid-body transform that is set to represent this pose 3D. Modified.

      • get

        default void get​(us.ihmc.euclid.transform.QuaternionBasedTransform transformToPack)
        Packs this pose 3D into the given transformToPack.
        Parameters:
        transformToPack - the quaternion-based transform that is set to represent this pose 3D. Modified.

      • epsilonEquals

        default boolean epsilonEquals​(Pose3DReadOnly other,
                              double epsilon)
        Tests on a per-component basis if this pose is equal to other with the tolerance epsilon.
        Parameters:
        other - the query. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance to use.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses are equal, false otherwise.

      • geometricallyEquals

        default boolean geometricallyEquals​(Pose3DReadOnly other,
                                    double epsilon)
        Compares this to other to determine if the two poses are geometrically similar.

        Two poses are geometrically equal if both their position and orientation are geometrically equal.

        Parameters:
        other - the pose to compare to. Not modified.
        epsilon - the tolerance of the comparison.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses represent the same geometry, false otherwise.

      • equals

        default boolean equals​(Pose3DReadOnly other)
        Tests on a per component basis, if this pose 3D is exactly equal to other.
        Parameters:
        other - the other pose 3D to compare against this. Not modified.
        Returns:
        true if the two poses are exactly equal component-wise, false otherwise.
